name: Jedi Training Simulator (PrIMD)
description:
Have you ever dream to learn to be a Jedi ?
That your lucky day if you have a Gear VR and a crappy phone with it.

The game run on Galaxy Note 4 phone with the Gear VR.
The light saber is controlled with a second phone that use the accelerometer.




Install the game

Install:
1. Install JediTrainingSimulator.apk on Galaxy Note 4
2. Install LightSaber.apk on your other phone

Play:
3. Open a shared wifi on your Galaxy Note 4
4. Connect your second phone on this wifi
5. Launch Jedi Training Simulator application
6. Put your phone in the GearVR helmet
7. Launch the Light Saber application

Feel the force:
Use your second phone in your hands like your were holding a light saber.
Rotate the phone to move the light saber.


(Sorry for the latency in the light saber, I know about it and am going to change it if I code an other version of the game)
